nodes.text: StarFlora Corp was a company that specialized in agricultural products. According to Volt Vescuso, a Batuuan resident, the company offered to buy the Surabat grain harvested by Kat Saka, but Saka refused to sell it, despite the amount of credits offered.
StarFlora Corp was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
